metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3195 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Out of bounds write in Storage in Google Chrome prior to 105.0.5195.125allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory write via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
